name: Horeca Vlaanderen
goal: Horeca Vlaanderen is the employer's organization for the hospitality sector in Flanders. We defend the intrests of the sector il all fields.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives: The European activities mainly happen within our European umbrella-organization, HOTREC, but Horeca Vlaanderen also develops general contacts with Belgian MEP's and specific contacts (f. ex. on fair trade) with DG's.
